description: This BlackYak Barzona marks the introduction of a new level of durability and user ergonomics. The new Hugger Hood features a fixed insert within the hood assembly that when adjusted creates the perfect interface between hood, helmet and head. The Barzona also utilizes a new for 2019 Gore-Tex® Pro Shell three layer laminate with 70 denier polyamide filaments for extra durability.
name: Black Yak Barzona Jacket - Mens
